title: The G-7 Will Get a Different Hotel
text:
President Trump has wisely reversed his decision to host next year’s G-7 summit at the Trump National Doral resort in Miami. In tweets late Saturday, the President blamed “Media & Democrat Crazed and Irrational Hostility,” but as we wrote Friday there were plenty of rational reasons to think that the choice of Doral was an example of political malpractice.

Start with the purportedly neutral selection process. Acting Chief of Staff Mick Mulvaney said the White House began with a list of 12 contenders and visited 10. The...
description: Trump pulls the plug on his bad idea to host world leaders at a Trump resort.
